H0.text: character in macbeth who is murdered and appears as a ghost. Macduff

H1.text: character in macbeth who is murdered and appears as a ghost. Lady Macbeth

H2.text: character in macbeth who is murdered and appears as a ghost. Duncan

H3.text: character in macbeth who is murdered and appears as a ghost. Banquo

A4.text: Macbeth has Banquo murdered by three hired assassins.

A5.text: The ghost of Banquo later returns to haunt Macbeth at the banquet in Act Three, Scene Four.
